summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 5th Avenue West, from West Bertona Street to West Dravus Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 13171 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
